parameters.name: Type1
parameters.description: Type of entity as defined in swSelectType_e

parameters.name: PDir1
parameters.description: Entity that defines the extraction direction (see Remarks )

parameters.name: Type2
parameters.description: Type of entity as defined in swSelectType_e

parameters.name: PDir2
parameters.description: Entity that defines the extraction direction (see Remarks )

title: ICoreFeatureData.GetExtractionDirection
description: Gets the entities that define the extraction direction of this core feature.
signature:
System.Int32 GetExtractionDirection( 
   out System.Int32
Type1
,
   out System.Object
PDir1
,
   out System.Int32
Type2
,
   out System.Object
PDir2
)

parameters.name: Type1
parameters.description: Type of entity as defined in swSelectType_e

parameters.name: PDir1
parameters.description: Entity that defines the extraction direction (see Remarks )

parameters.name: Type2
parameters.description: Type of entity as defined in swSelectType_e

parameters.name: PDir2
parameters.description: Entity that defines the extraction direction (see Remarks )

returns: Number of entities that define the extraction direction
remarks:
The types of entities that define the extraction direction are:
Face
Plane
Edge
Vertex
Sketch line
Sketch point
There can be two entities because two sketch points can specify a direction.
